items.title: Apple Scores Partial Win In Epic Games Fight As Appeals Court Scales Back Parts of Sanctions: Report
items.description: The San Francisco-based 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals reportedly ruled that parts of a judge’s April order holding Apple in contempt for violating...

items.title: OpenAI Hits Back At Google’s Gemini 3 With New Advanced Model Boosting Reasoning And Coding Power
items.description: The rollout comes alongside a broader enterprise push, including a new chief revenue officer and sharply higher ChatGPT adoption inside companies.

items.title: Rhythm Pharmaceuticals Stock Rises After Positive Study Data For Setmelanotide In Treating Genetic Disorder
items.description: The company was studying the therapy in Prader-Willi Syndrome, a rare genetic disorder requiring lifelong management.

items.title: JP Morgan Uses Public Blockchain For The First Time to Issue Debt
items.description: According to a report by Reuters, JP Morgan reportedly issued a $50 million U.S. commercial paper for Galaxy Digital Holdings.

items.title: Apollo Global Management Weighs IPO Or Sale Of Invited In Potential Deal That Could Top $3B: Report
items.description: JPMorgan and Wells Fargo have reportedly been engaged to advise on the process.
